name: 555 (vscza)
description:
This game was initially developed for the game jam "A jam about time". 

Play in browser or download for windows.

This is the first game that I made all by myself. It took me a lot of hard work, but to submit to the game jam, im satisfied.

Well, i think I will keep working on this project, so, maybe soon it will be expanded.
 
Sorry for any grammatical mistake (:

Hope you enjoy

IC 555 game

Art, Code & Game Design - Vinicius Scorza
